title: Flipped Learning-Based Engineering Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of engineering education theory and experience with project-based learning
context.additional_context: A course strengthening flipped learning design competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers, focusing on enhancing interaction through learner collaboration and digital platform utilization

learning_goals: Explain the engineering education design process applying the flipped learning model
Present three or more strategies to optimize interactions between learning-content, learning-instructor, and learning-peer
Write a report analyzing interaction barriers for large-scale learners based on transactional distance theory
Develop one or more flipped learning lesson materials using digital platforms (e.g., LMS, collaboration tools) accessible in BYOD environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
